entry.string: The Themes Module controls the display of your website. Certain display variables are set from this module to allow you to control the site name, footer information, etc.
entry.translation: Das Themes-Modul kontrolliert die Anzeige der Website. Bestimmte Anzeige-Variablen - wie Site-Name, Footer-Information usw. - werden mithilfe dieses Moduls eingestellt,

entry.string: From the menu, you have three choices.
View Themes: Allows you to see what themes are currently installed on your system, and the current state that they are in.
Template Tags: Allows you to view, edit, and delete template tags on the system, as well as add new tags to functions.
Modify Configuration: Allows you to set certain display configuration values.
Metablock: The meta block allows you to configure at one time the meta values for your site. This template can be overridden from your theme directory.
The Themes module has a user menu hook which allows the users of your Xaraya site to change the default theme to their choosing. This can be activated and deactivated from the modules module.
